description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个共产主义政党，也被称为YC团。
description.en: A communist political party in Chinese history, also known as the YC Group.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国青年共产党的创始人之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, one of the founders of the Young Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国青年共产党的创始人之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, one of the founders of the Young Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国四川省的省会，是中国青年共产党的成立地点。
description.en: The capital of Sichuan Province, China, and the founding place of the Young Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。中国青年共产党的创始人吴玉章、杨暗公后加入该党。
description.en: The ruling party of China. Wu Yuzhang and Yang Angong, founders of the Young Communist Party of China, later joined this party.

description.zh-cn: 成都YC团负责人，后投靠蒋介石。
description.en: Leader of the Chengdu YC Group, who later defected to Chiang Kai-shek.

en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的政治及军事领导人。
description.en: A political and military leader during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 成都YC团成员，参与起草解散成都YC团的宣言。
description.en: A member of the Chengdu YC Group who participated in drafting the declaration to dissolve it.

description.zh-cn: 成都YC团成员，参与起草解散成都YC团的宣言。
description.en: A member of the Chengdu YC Group who participated in drafting the declaration to dissolve it.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都。中国青年共产党曾在此设有分支，后自行解体。
description.en: Capital of the People's Republic of China. The Young Communist Party of China once had a branch here, which later dissolved on its own.

description.zh-cn: 与杨暗公等二十余人于成都秘密成立了中国青年共产党。
description.en: Secretly founded the Young Communist Party of China in Chengdu with Yang Angong and more than 20 others.

description.zh-cn: 与吴玉章等二十余人于其成都住处秘密成立了中国青年共产党。
description.en: Secretly founded the Young Communist Party of China at his residence in Chengdu with Wu Yuzhang and more than 20 others.

description.zh-cn: 1925年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 1925年加入中国共产党。
description.en: Joined the Chinese Communist Party in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 在加入中国共产党后，吴玉章认为YC团已无必要继续存在，决定将其解散，并劝导北京YC团成员加入中共，促使其自行解体。
description.en: After joining the Chinese Communist Party, Wu Yuzhang believed the YC Group was no longer necessary and decided to dissolve it. He persuaded members of the Beijing YC Group to join the CCP, leading to its self-dissolution.

description.zh-cn: 担任中国青年共产党在成都分支的负责人。
description.en: Served as the leader of the Chengdu branch of the Young Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 拒绝了傅双无提出的将成都YC团集体转入中共并接办成都党务的条件。
description.en: Rejected Fu Shuangwu's condition that the Chengdu YC Group be collectively transferred to the CCP and take over party affairs in Chengdu.

description.zh-cn: 在与中共中央的交涉失败后，傅双无转而投靠蒋介石。
description.en: After negotiations with the CCP Central Committee failed, Fu Shuangwu defected to Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 与吕寒潭一同出面起草宣言，解散了成都YC团。
description.en: Together with Lü Hantan, he came forward to draft a declaration and dissolved the Chengdu YC Group.

description.zh-cn: 与郭祖劼一同出面起草宣言，解散了成都YC团。
description.en: Together with Guo Zujie, he came forward to draft a declaration and dissolved the Chengdu YC Group.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央是中国共产党的中央领导机构，直接隶属于中国共产党。
description.en: The Central Committee of the CCP is the central leading body of the Chinese Communist Party and is directly subordinate to it.
